name: Algebra I
subject: Math
description: Foundation for algebraic functions and equations.

name: Geometry
subject: Math
description: Study of geometric structures, logical reasoning, transformations, proof.

name: Geometry (Advanced)
subject: Math
description: Advanced study of geometric structures, logical reasoning, transformations, proof.

name: Algebra II
subject: Math
description: Broadens knowledge of functions (quadratic, exponential, logarithmic, etc.) and systems.

name: Algebra II (Advanced)
subject: Math
description: Advanced study of functions (quadratic, exponential, logarithmic, etc.) and systems.

name: Precalculus
subject: Math
description: Functions, equations, limits as tools for analyzing relationships.

name: Precalculus (Advanced)
subject: Math
description: Advanced study of functions, equations, limits.

name: Statistics
subject: Math
description: Study of variability, sampling, probability, inference, data analysis.

name: Statistics AP
subject: Math
description: AP Level: Descriptive/inferential statistics, probability, study design.

name: Calculus AB AP
subject: Math
description: AP Level: Differential calculus, intro to integral calculus.

name: Calculus BC AP
subject: Math
description: AP Level: Covers AB topics plus extensive integral calculus.
